verses.english: Praise ye the LORD. Praise God in his sanctuary: praise him in the firmament of his power.

strongs_def: to be clear (orig. of sound, but usually of color); to shine; hence, to make ashow, to boast; and thus to be (clamorously) foolish; to rave; causatively, to celebrate; also to stultify
gloss: (make) boast (self), celebrate, commend, (deal, make), fool(-ish, -ly), glory, give (light), be (make, feign self) mad (against), give in marriage, (sing, be worthy of) praise, rage, renowned, shine.

derivation: contraction for H3068 (יְהֹוָה), and meaning the same;
strongs_def: Jah, the sacred name
gloss: Jah, the Lord, most vehement. Compare names in '-iah,' '-jah.'

strongs_def: to be clear (orig. of sound, but usually of color); to shine; hence, to make ashow, to boast; and thus to be (clamorously) foolish; to rave; causatively, to celebrate; also to stultify
gloss: (make) boast (self), celebrate, commend, (deal, make), fool(-ish, -ly), glory, give (light), be (make, feign self) mad (against), give in marriage, (sing, be worthy of) praise, rage, renowned, shine.

strongs_def: strength; as adjective, mighty; especially the Almighty (but used also of any deity)
gloss: God (god), [idiom] goodly, [idiom] great, idol, might(-y one), power, strong. Compare names in '-el.'

strongs_def: a sacred place or thing; rarely abstract, sanctity
gloss: consecrated (thing), dedicated (thing), hallowed (thing), holiness, ([idiom] most) holy ([idiom] day, portion, thing), saint, sanctuary.

strongs_def: to be clear (orig. of sound, but usually of color); to shine; hence, to make ashow, to boast; and thus to be (clamorously) foolish; to rave; causatively, to celebrate; also to stultify
gloss: (make) boast (self), celebrate, commend, (deal, make), fool(-ish, -ly), glory, give (light), be (make, feign self) mad (against), give in marriage, (sing, be worthy of) praise, rage, renowned, shine.

strongs_def: properly, an expanse, i.e. the firmament or (apparently) visible arch of the sky
gloss: firmament.

strongs_def: strength in various applications (force, security, majesty, praise)
gloss: boldness, loud, might, power, strength, strong.

verses.english: Praise him for his mighty acts: praise him according to his excellent greatness.

strongs_def: to be clear (orig. of sound, but usually of color); to shine; hence, to make ashow, to boast; and thus to be (clamorously) foolish; to rave; causatively, to celebrate; also to stultify
gloss: (make) boast (self), celebrate, commend, (deal, make), fool(-ish, -ly), glory, give (light), be (make, feign self) mad (against), give in marriage, (sing, be worthy of) praise, rage, renowned, shine.

derivation: feminine passive participle from the same as H1368 (גִּבּוֹר);
strongs_def: force (literally or figuratively); by implication, valor, victory
gloss: force, mastery, might, mighty (act, power), power, strength.

strongs_def: to be clear (orig. of sound, but usually of color); to shine; hence, to make ashow, to boast; and thus to be (clamorously) foolish; to rave; causatively, to celebrate; also to stultify
gloss: (make) boast (self), celebrate, commend, (deal, make), fool(-ish, -ly), glory, give (light), be (make, feign self) mad (against), give in marriage, (sing, be worthy of) praise, rage, renowned, shine.

strongs_def: abundance (in any respect)
gloss: abundance(-antly), all, [idiom] common (sort), excellent, great(-ly, -ness, number), huge, be increased, long, many, more in number, most, much, multitude, plenty(-ifully), [idiom] very (age).

strongs_def: magnitude (literally or figuratively)
gloss: greatness, stout(-ness).

verses.english: Praise him with the sound of the trumpet: praise him with the psaltery and harp.

strongs_def: to be clear (orig. of sound, but usually of color); to shine; hence, to make ashow, to boast; and thus to be (clamorously) foolish; to rave; causatively, to celebrate; also to stultify
gloss: (make) boast (self), celebrate, commend, (deal, make), fool(-ish, -ly), glory, give (light), be (make, feign self) mad (against), give in marriage, (sing, be worthy of) praise, rage, renowned, shine.

strongs_def: a blast of a trumpet
gloss: sound.

derivation: or שֹׁפָר; from H8231 (שָׁפַר) in the original sense of incising;
strongs_def: a cornet (as giving a clear sound) or curved horn
gloss: cornet, trumpet.

strongs_def: to be clear (orig. of sound, but usually of color); to shine; hence, to make ashow, to boast; and thus to be (clamorously) foolish; to rave; causatively, to celebrate; also to stultify
gloss: (make) boast (self), celebrate, commend, (deal, make), fool(-ish, -ly), glory, give (light), be (make, feign self) mad (against), give in marriage, (sing, be worthy of) praise, rage, renowned, shine.

strongs_def: a skin-bag for liquids (from collapsing when empty); hence, a vase (as similar in shape when full); also a lyre (as having a body of like form)
gloss: bottle, pitcher, psaltery, vessel, viol.

derivation: from a unused root meaning to twang;
strongs_def: a harp
gloss: harp.

verses.english: Praise him with the timbrel and dance: praise him with stringed instruments and organs.

strongs_def: to be clear (orig. of sound, but usually of color); to shine; hence, to make ashow, to boast; and thus to be (clamorously) foolish; to rave; causatively, to celebrate; also to stultify
gloss: (make) boast (self), celebrate, commend, (deal, make), fool(-ish, -ly), glory, give (light), be (make, feign self) mad (against), give in marriage, (sing, be worthy of) praise, rage, renowned, shine.

strongs_def: a tambourine
gloss: tabret, timbrel.

strongs_def: a (round) dance
gloss: dance(-cing).

strongs_def: to be clear (orig. of sound, but usually of color); to shine; hence, to make ashow, to boast; and thus to be (clamorously) foolish; to rave; causatively, to celebrate; also to stultify
gloss: (make) boast (self), celebrate, commend, (deal, make), fool(-ish, -ly), glory, give (light), be (make, feign self) mad (against), give in marriage, (sing, be worthy of) praise, rage, renowned, shine.

derivation: from an unused root meaning to apportion; a part; hence,
strongs_def: a musical chord (as parted into strings)
gloss: in (the same) (Psalm 68:23), stringed instrument (Psalm 150:4), whereby (Psalm 45:8 (defective plural)).

derivation: or עֻגָּב; from H5689 (עֲגַב) in the original sense of breathing;
strongs_def: a reed-instrument of music
gloss: organ.

verses.english: Praise him upon the loud cymbals: praise him upon the high sounding cymbals.

strongs_def: to be clear (orig. of sound, but usually of color); to shine; hence, to make ashow, to boast; and thus to be (clamorously) foolish; to rave; causatively, to celebrate; also to stultify
gloss: (make) boast (self), celebrate, commend, (deal, make), fool(-ish, -ly), glory, give (light), be (make, feign self) mad (against), give in marriage, (sing, be worthy of) praise, rage, renowned, shine.

strongs_def: a clatter, i.e. (abstractly) whirring (of wings); (concretely) a cricket; also a harpoon (as rattling), a cymbal (as clanging)
gloss: cymbal, locust, shadowing, spear.

strongs_def: something heard, i.e. a sound, rumor, announcement; abstractly, audience
gloss: bruit, fame, hear(-ing), loud, report, speech, tidings.

strongs_def: to be clear (orig. of sound, but usually of color); to shine; hence, to make ashow, to boast; and thus to be (clamorously) foolish; to rave; causatively, to celebrate; also to stultify
gloss: (make) boast (self), celebrate, commend, (deal, make), fool(-ish, -ly), glory, give (light), be (make, feign self) mad (against), give in marriage, (sing, be worthy of) praise, rage, renowned, shine.

strongs_def: a clatter, i.e. (abstractly) whirring (of wings); (concretely) a cricket; also a harpoon (as rattling), a cymbal (as clanging)
gloss: cymbal, locust, shadowing, spear.

strongs_def: clamor, i.e. acclamation of joy or a battle-cry; especially clangorof trumpets, as an alarum
gloss: alarm, blow(-ing) (of, the) (trumpets), joy, jubile, loud noise, rejoicing, shout(-ing), (high, joyful) sound(-ing).

verses.english: Let every thing that hath breath praise the LORD. Praise ye the LORD.

strongs_def: properly, the whole; hence, all, any or every (in the singular only, but often in a plural sense)
gloss: (in) all (manner, (ye)), altogether, any (manner), enough, every (one, place, thing), howsoever, as many as, (no-) thing, ought, whatsoever, (the) whole, whoso(-ever).

strongs_def: a puff, i.e. wind, angry or vital breath, divine inspiration, intellect. or (concretely) an animal
gloss: blast, (that) breath(-eth), inspiration, soul, spirit.

strongs_def: to be clear (orig. of sound, but usually of color); to shine; hence, to make ashow, to boast; and thus to be (clamorously) foolish; to rave; causatively, to celebrate; also to stultify
gloss: (make) boast (self), celebrate, commend, (deal, make), fool(-ish, -ly), glory, give (light), be (make, feign self) mad (against), give in marriage, (sing, be worthy of) praise, rage, renowned, shine.

derivation: contraction for H3068 (יְהֹוָה), and meaning the same;
strongs_def: Jah, the sacred name
gloss: Jah, the Lord, most vehement. Compare names in '-iah,' '-jah.'
